name: Harmful Park
summary: Harmful Park is a 1997 side scrolling shooting game developed by Sky Think Systems for the PlayStation. It has not been released outside of Japan. Set in a theme park, the game has been described as a "cute em up", and resembles Konami's Parodius games.
info:
• 别名: ハームフル・パーク
  • 平台: PS
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 1997/2/14
  • Developer: Sky Think Systems
  • Publisher: Sky Think Systems
